languages.text: "Что именно ты вкладываешь в этот вопрос? Как меня зовут? Я — Иако Сотний, тут я не лгал. Каково мое ремесло? У меня его нет, я был рожден в издыхающем от переполненности людьми улье и всю жизнь пытался просто выживать... всеми способами, какие мне давала судьба".

"What do you mean by that? Are you asking what my name is? It's Iako Sotniy, I didn't lie about that. You want to know my trade? I've got none. I was born in a hive that was suffocating from overpopulation. All I did my whole life was just... survive, using whatever means fate would throw my way."
languages.original_text: "Что именно ты вкладываешь в этот вопрос? Как меня зовут? Я — Иако Сотний, тут я не лгал. Каково мое ремесло? У меня его нет, я был рожден в издыхающем от переполненности людьми улье и всю жизнь пытался просто выживать... всеми способами, какие мне давала судьба".

traits.locale_text: "What do you mean by that? Are you asking what my name is? It's Iako Sotniy, I didn't lie about that. You want to know my trade? I got none. I was born in a hive that was suffocating from overpopulation. All I did my whole life was just... survive, using whatever means fate would throw my way."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

I was born in a hive that was suffocating from overpopulation. All I did my whole life was just... survive, using whatever means fate would throw my way."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “这是什么意思？你是想问我的名字吗？我叫伊科·索蒂尼，这一点我并没有撒谎。你想了解我的职业吗？我没有职业。我生在一个人口过多的巢都里，几乎让人喘不了气。我这辈子唯一做过的事情就是……想办法活下来，无论采取什么手段。”
languages.original_text: "What do you mean by that? Are you asking what my name is? It's Iako Sotniy, I didn't lie about that. You want to know my trade? I've got none. I was born in a hive that was suffocating from overpopulation. All I did my whole life was just... survive, using whatever means fate would throw my way."

traits.locale_text: “这是什么意思？你是想问我的名字吗？我叫伊科·索蒂尼，这一点我并没有撒谎。你想了解我的职业吗？我没有职业。我生在一个人口过多的巢都里，几乎让人喘不了气。我这辈子唯一做过的事情就是……想办法活下来，无论采取什么手段。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「質問の意味がわかりませんね。私の本名でしょうか？以前答えたとおり、イアコ・ソトニーと申します。嘘はついていません。特に商売も何もしてません。私は人口過多で窒息しそうなハイヴで生まれました。私は生きるのに必死で…とにかく運命に翻弄されてきました」
languages.original_text: "What do you mean by that? Are you asking what my name is? It's Iako Sotniy, I didn't lie about that. You want to know my trade? I've got none. I was born in a hive that was suffocating from overpopulation. All I did my whole life was just... survive, using whatever means fate would throw my way."

traits.locale_text: 「質問の意味がわかりませんね。私の本名でしょうか？以前答えたとおり、イアコ・ソトニーと申します。嘘はついていません。特に商売も何もしてません。私は人口過多で窒息しそうなハイヴで生まれました。私は生きるのに必死で…とにかく運命に翻弄されてきました」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «¿Qué quiere decir con eso? ¿Quiere saber mi nombre? Es Iako Sotniy; no mentí sobre eso. ¿Quiere saber cuál es mi oficio? No tengo ninguno. Nací en una colmena que se sofocaba bajo el peso de la sobrepoblación. Lo único que hice durante toda mi vida fue... sobrevivir, con los medios que el destino me otorgaba».
languages.original_text: "What do you mean by that? Are you asking what my name is? It's Iako Sotniy, I didn't lie about that. You want to know my trade? I've got none. I was born in a hive that was suffocating from overpopulation. All I did my whole life was just... survive, using whatever means fate would throw my way."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué quiere decir con eso? ¿Quiere saber mi nombre? Es Iako Sotniy; no mentí sobre eso. ¿Quiere saber cuál es mi oficio? No tengo ninguno. Nací en una colmena que se sofocaba bajo el peso de la sobrepoblación. Lo único que hice durante toda mi vida fue... sobrevivir, con los medios que el destino me otorgaba».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "What do you mean by that? Are you asking what my name is? It's Iako Sotniy, I didn't lie about that. You want to know my trade? I've got none. I was born in a hive that was suffocating from overpopulation. All I did my whole life was just... survive, using whatever means fate would throw my way."

languages.text: « Que voulez-vous dire ? C'est mon nom que vous voulez connaître ? Je m'appelle Iako Sotniy, comme je vous l'ai déjà dit. C'est la vérité. Si vous voulez savoir quelle est ma profession, je n'en ai pas. Je suis né dans une ruche surpeuplée. Toute ma vie, je n'ai fait que... survivre, par tous les moyens que le destin a jugé bon de me présenter. »
languages.original_text: "What do you mean by that? Are you asking what my name is? It's Iako Sotniy, I didn't lie about that. You want to know my trade? I've got none. I was born in a hive that was suffocating from overpopulation. All I did my whole life was just... survive, using whatever means fate would throw my way."

traits.locale_text: « Que voulez-vous dire ? C'est mon nom que vous voulez connaître ? Je m'appelle Iako Sotniy, comme je vous l'ai déjà dit. C'est la vérité. Si vous voulez savoir quelle est ma profession, je n'en ai pas. Je suis né dans une ruche surpeuplée. Toute ma vie, je n'ai fait que... survivre, par tous les moyens que le destin a jugé bon de me présenter. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Was meint Ihr damit? Wollt Ihr wissen, wie ich heiße? Iako Sotniy, das war keine Lüge. Wollt Ihr meinen Beruf wissen? Ich habe keinen. Ich wurde in einer Makropole geboren, die an Überbevölkerung erstickte. Ich habe mein ganzes Leben immer nur ... überlebt, mit allen Mitteln, die das Schicksal mir in die Hände gespielt hat."
languages.original_text: "What do you mean by that? Are you asking what my name is? It's Iako Sotniy, I didn't lie about that. You want to know my trade? I've got none. I was born in a hive that was suffocating from overpopulation. All I did my whole life was just... survive, using whatever means fate would throw my way."

traits.locale_text: "Was meint Ihr damit? Wollt Ihr wissen, wie ich heiße? Iako Sotniy, das war keine Lüge. Wollt Ihr meinen Beruf wissen? Ich habe keinen. Ich wurde in einer Makropole geboren, die an Überbevölkerung erstickte. Ich habe mein ganzes Leben immer nur ... überlebt, mit alles Mitten, die das Schicksal mir in die Hände gespielt hat."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Ne demek istiyorsun? İsmimi mi soruyorsun? İsmim İako Sotniy işte, o konuda yalan söylemedim. Neyle meşgul olduğumu mu öğrenmek istiyorsun? İşim yok. Aşırı nüfustan boğulan bir kovanda doğdum. Hayatım boyunca tek yaptığım... Hayatta kalmaktı. Kader karşıma ne çıkarırsa çıkarsın ondan faydalanmasını bildim."
languages.original_text: "What do you mean by that? Are you asking what my name is? It's Iako Sotniy, I didn't lie about that. You want to know my trade? I've got none. I was born in a hive that was suffocating from overpopulation. All I did my whole life was just... survive, using whatever means fate would throw my way."

traits.locale_text: "Ne demek istiyorsun? İsmimin ne olduğunu mu soruyorsun? İako Sotniy, o konuda yalan söylemedim. Neyle meşgul olduğumu mu öğrenmek istiyorsun? İşim yok. Aşırı nüfus nedeniyle boğulmakta olan bir kovanda doğdum. Hayatım boyunca tek yaptığım... Hayatta kalmaktı. Kader karşıma ne çıkarırsa çıkarsın onu faydama kullanarak."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
